description: Detects usage of the "TcpClient" class. Which can be abused to establish remote connections and reverse-shells. As seen used by the Nishang "Invoke-PowerShellTcpOneLine" reverse shell and other.
author: FPT.EagleEye
wagga
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: In rare administrative cases, this function might be used to check network connectivity
name: Potential Powershell ReverseShell Connection
query: (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll")) OR (process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe"))) AND (process.command_line.text:"*\ Net.Sockets.TCPClient*" AND process.command_line.text:"*.GetStream\(*" AND process.command_line.text:"*.Write\(*"))
